imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Tactical combat-themed hero banner with dramatic battlefield atmosphere (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Gaming app logo featuring bold 'Fire Fight' text with tactical military styling (logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Game lobby background with strategic map aesthetic (lobby-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Player avatar placeholder icon with soldier silhouette (avatar-default.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity to allow players to create accounts and log in securely
Create a game lobby system where authenticated players can view available game rooms and join matches
Build a turn-based tactical combat game with a top-down 2D or simple 3D battlefield view where players take turns moving and attacking
Create a leaderboard system that tracks player wins, losses, and ranking across all matches
Design a cohesive visual theme with bold, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and tactical military-inspired UI elements that create an immersive combat gaming atmosphere

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a health and damage system where players have health points that decrease when hit, and game ends when a player reaches zero health
